Name: AddressType

Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures

Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: CarePlanActivityKind
Title: Care Plan Activity Kind
Descriptino: Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

Name: CarePlanActivityStatus

Descriptino: Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

Descriptino: Example codes indicating the category a care plan falls within.  Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: ConditionVerificationStatus

Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

Name: DataAbsentReason

Descriptino: Used to specify why the normally expected content of the data element is missing.

Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

Name: DiagnosticReportStatus

Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate from where the patient came in.

Name: Diet
Title: Diet
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

Name: DischargeDisposition
Title: Discharge disposition

Name: EncounterLocationStatus
Title: EncounterLocationStatus
Descriptino: The status of the location.

Name: ParticipantType
Title: Participant type
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

Name: EncounterReasonCodes
Title: Encounter Reason Codes
Descriptino: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

Name: SpecialArrangements

Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

Name: SpecialCourtesy
Title: Special courtesy
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate special courtesies provided to the patient.

Name: EncounterStatus
Title: EncounterStatus
Descriptino: Current state of the encounter.

Name: EncounterType
Title: Encounter type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

Name: EpisodeOfCareStatus
Title: EpisodeOfCareStatus
Descriptino: The status of the episode of care.

Name: EpisodeOfCareType
Title: Episode of care type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the usage type of an EpisodeOfCare record.

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: LocationType
Title: Location type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

Name: ManifestationAndSymptomCodes
Title: Manifestation and Symptom Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Manifestation and Symptom codes.

Name: Marital Status Codes
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationAsNeededReasonCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication As Needed Reason Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all clinical findings from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: NameUse

Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: ObservationCategoryCodes
Title: Observation Category Codes
Descriptino: Observation Category codes.

Name: LOINCCodes
Title: LOINC Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all LOINC codes

Name: ObservationInterpretationCodes
Title: Observation Interpretation Codes
Descriptino: A categorical assessment, providing a rough qualitative interpretation of the observation value,    such as “normal”/ “abnormal”,”low” / “high”, “better” / “worse”, “susceptible” / “resistant”, “expected”/ “not expected”.    The value set is intended to be for ANY use where coded representation of an interpretation is needed.             Notes:          This is being communicated in v2.x in OBX-8 (Observation Interpretation), in v3 in ObservationInterpretation (CWE) in R1 (Representative Realm) and in FHIR in    Observation.interpretation. Historically these values come from the laboratory domain, and these codes are extensively    used. The value set binding is extensible, so codes outside the value set that are needed for interpretation concepts    (i.e. particular meanings) that are not included in the value set can be used, and these new codes may also be added to    the value set and published in a future version.

Name: ObservationMethods
Title: Observation Methods
Descriptino: Observation Method codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 272394005 (Technique (qualifier value)) or is-a 129264002 (Action (qualifier value)) or is-a 386053000 (Evaluation procedure(procedure))

Name: ObservationStatus
Title: ObservationStatus
Descriptino: Codes providing the status of an observation.

Name: OrganizationType
Title: Organization type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate a type of organization.

Name: ParticipantRoles
Title: Participant Roles
Descriptino: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

Name: PatientContactRelationship
Title: Patient Contact Relationship
Descriptino: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

Name: ProcedurePerformerRoleCodes
Title: Procedure Performer Role Codes
Descriptino: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a role of a procedure performer.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeAppliesToCodes

Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the particular target population the reference range applies to.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeMeaningCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Meaning Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the meaning/use of a reference range for a particular target population.

Name: RequestIntent

Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

Name: RequestPriority
Title: Request priority
Descriptino: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

Name: RequestStatus
Title: RequestStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service type
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: ServiceRequestCategoryCodes
Title: Service Request Category Codes
Descriptino: An example value set of SNOMED CT concepts that can classify a requested service

Name: ServiceRequestOrderDetailsCodes
Title: Service Request Order Details Codes
Descriptino: An example value set of Codified order entry details concepts.  These concepts only make sense in the context of what is being ordered.  This example is for a patient ventilation order

Name: FHIRSpecimenCollectionMethod
Title: FHIR Specimen Collection Method
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the method by which a specimen was collected.

Name: SpecimenContainerType
Title: Specimen Container Type
Descriptino: Checks on the patient prior specimen collection. All SNOMED CT concepts descendants of 706041008 |Device for body fluid and tissue collection/transfer/processing (physical object)|

Name: SpecimenProcessingProcedure
Title: Specimen processing procedure
Descriptino: The technique that is used to perform the process or preserve the specimen.

Name: SpecimenStatus
Title: SpecimenStatus
Descriptino: Codes providing the status/availability of a specimen.

Name: TaskCode
Title: Task Codes
Descriptino: Codes indicating the type of action that is expected to be performed

Name: TaskIntent
Title: TaskIntent
Descriptino: Distinguishes whether the task is a proposal, plan or full order.

Name: TaskStatus
Title: TaskStatus
Descriptino: The current status of the task.

Name: VSARTRegimenChangeType
Title: ART Regimen Change Types
Descriptino: A list of options to determine whether an ARV regimen was switched or substituted.

Name: VSARTRegimenLines
Title: ART Regimen Lines
Descriptino: A list of ART regimen therapeutic lines.

Name: VSARVRegimen
Title: A list of ARV regimen
Descriptino: A list of ARV regimen.

Name: VSARVMedicationRequest
Title: ARV Treatment Medication Request
Descriptino: Codes used to represent a medication request for ART.

Name: VSCarePlanActivityOutcome
Title: ARV treatment outcomes
Descriptino: A list of possible ARV treatment outcomes.

Name: VSCondition
Title: Conditions
Descriptino: A list of possible HIV conditions.

Name: VSHIVTestDone
Title: HIV Test Done
Descriptino: Used by the observation to indicate that a HIV test was performed.

Name: VSKeyPopulationSatus
Title: Key Population Status
Descriptino: A list of key population types

Name: VSReasonForAssessment
Title: Reason for Assessment
Descriptino: A list of reasons associated with the service request for the lab order.

Name: VSReasonForSampleCancellationOrRejection
Title: Reasons why a lab order was cancelled or rejected
Descriptino: Reasons why a lab order was cancelled or rejected.

Name: VSSpecimenType
Title: Specimen Type Used In Viral Load testing
Descriptino: A list of specimen types.

Name: VSTestTypes
Title: Test Types
Descriptino: A list of HIV test types

Name: VSVLResultCode
Title: Viral Load Result Code
Descriptino: A code used to indicate the category for the lab result.

Name: VSVLSuppression

Name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
Title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
Descriptino: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

Name: Hl7VSAdditivePreservative
Title: hl7VS-additivePreservative
Descriptino: Concepts specifying any additive introduced to the specimen before or at the time of collection.  These additives may be introduced in order to preserve, maintain or enhance the particular nature or component of the specimen.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

Name: Hl7VSSpecimenCondition
Title: hl7VS-specimenCondition
Descriptino: Concepts of modes or states of being that describe the nature of a specimen.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the SPM segment.

Name: Hl7VSRelevantClincialInformation
Title: hl7VS-relevantClincialInformation
Descriptino: Value Set of codes that specify additional clinical information about the patient or specimen to report the supporting and/or suspected diagnosis and clinical findings on requests for interpreted diagnostic studies.

Name: v2.0360.2.7
Title: v2 table 0360
Descriptino: Version 2.7
Uses: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0360 ver 2.9 ( Degree/License/Certificate)

Name: ActEncounterCode
Title: ActEncounterCode
Descriptino: Domain provides codes that qualify the ActEncounterClass (ENC)

Name: ActPriority
Title: ActPriority
Descriptino: A code or set of codes (e.g., for routine, emergency,) specifying the urgency under which the Act happened, can happen, is happening, is intended to happen, or is requested/demanded to happen.    *Discussion:* This attribute is used in orders to indicate the ordered priority, and in event documentation it indicates the actual priority used to perform the act. In definition mood it indicates the available priorities.

Name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Descriptino: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.
